content.part2: I’m a Computer Science student, currently in the 6th semester, with focus on front-end development and growing interest in full-stack solutions. I constantly seek to improve my skills through courses in the area of programming and participation in academic projects and personal development, exploring good design practices and user experience.

content.name: NASA API Project
content.label: NASA API Project
content.content: This website was developed as part of a project to study and demonstrate the use of NASA’s public APIs. The goal is to explore how various technologies can be integrated to provide space data, images, and scientific events in an accessible way.

content.name: CHD Digital Point
content.label: CHD Digital Point
content.content: CHD Ponto Digital is a system developed for academic purposes, aimed at the management and recording of employee points. It allows efficient control of entry and exit times during business hours, using Java for system logic and a web interface built with React, Shadcn-UI, TailwindCSS and Vite.

content.name: Pokedex
content.label: Pokedex
content.content: The Pokédex Project is a website that allows users to browse and search for Pokémon, displaying information. Gets data from the PokéAPI to provide real-time updates on Pokémon characteristics.
